scripts.prebuild: npm run prestart && npm run test:ci && npm run build-storybook
scripts.//build: Hide autopay in production for now per client request. Keeping enabled elsewhere to avoid it regressing. Webpack bundle analyzer display build details.
scripts.build: cross-env REACT_APP_HIDE_AUTOPAY=true WEBPACK_BUNDLE_ANALYZER=Y REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL=https://bank.discover.com PUBLIC_URL=/bankac/static/billpay react-app-rewired build
scripts.//build:ci: Disables source maps to speed build on CI. Keeps scenario selector and mock API settings like development to support automated tests running against the mock API
scripts.build:ci: cross-env GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false REACT_APP_USE_SCENARIO_SELECTOR=Y REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3001 REACT_APP_USE_MOCK_API=Y PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:3000 react-app-rewired build
scripts.test:ci: cross-env CI=true react-app-rewired test && npm run cy:ci
scripts.//cy:ci: Run the app in prod build mode, but pointed against mock API for speed and consistent tests. Keep autopay enabled even though its not currently on in production to help assure autopay doesn't regress since we plan to turn it back on soon.
scripts.start:prod-without-autopay: cross-env REACT_APP_HIDE_AUTOPAY=true npm run build:ci && run-p start:api:ci serve:prod
scripts.start:prod-with-autopay: npm run build:ci && run-p start:api:ci serve:prod
